text: William Paul Petersen (born September 23, 1945) is an American actor and comedian, best known for portraying Jeff Stone on The Donna Reed Show. He began his show business career at the age of 10 as a Mouseketeer on the Mickey Mouse Club. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glendale, California Category:Comedians from Los Angeles County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Paul Petersen
